materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a snowy landscape in Murree, Punjab. There is a path in the middle of the photograph, with a fence on the left. The path is bordered by tall, snow-covered trees on either side. In the middle of the path, there is a man wearing a helmet, and holding a long stick. In the background, there are roofed houses on a hill. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Murree, Punjab
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Murree (Pakistan) Landscape photography Snow Winter
